overview.en: Nobe Chain is a game ecological platform for distributed smart contracts based on blockchain. Nobe Chain will serve the global game market, aiming to build a decentralized sharing platform through blockchain technology to reshape the game ecological pattern, with decentralization as the concept, the components of the entire game ecological chain will be directly Connected to achieve docking, circulation, and storage of assets, to provide revolutionary distributed blockchain game services for people around the world, Nobe Chain will disrupt the traditional game industry. NBH, as the ecological circulation medium of the Nobe Chain, can complete various digital asset transactions on the Nobe Chain, and realize value enhancement and globalization as the number of users grows. Nobe Chain will definitely promote the prosperity and development of the global blockchain game industry!
overview.zh: 诺贝链（Nobe Chain）是基于区块链构建的分布式智能合约的游戏生态平台。诺贝链（NobeChain）将服务于全球游戏市场，旨在通过区块链技术构建一个去中心化共享平台重塑游戏生态格局，以去中心化为理念直接将整个游戏生态链上的组成分子连接起来，实现资产对接、流通、和存储，为全球各地的人们提供革命性的分布式的区块链游戏服务，诺贝链（Nobe Chain）将颠覆传统的游戏行业。NBH作为诺贝链（Nobe Chain）生态的流通媒介，可以完成诺贝链上各种数字资产交易，随着用户规模增长实现价值提升与全球化。诺贝链（Nobe Chain）必将推动全球区块链游戏产业繁荣发展！
